author: Richard Reiner
comment: I hardly ever write reviews, but after trying every "aviation" style watchface on the Play Store, including several purchased ones, I've found this to be the best.  It's the clearest and most readable, both in full mode and in ambient mode; displays exactly what I want; doesn't have much customizability but why mess with perfection.    Thank you Gaetan!

author: Phil Walker
comment: I do not usually write reviews but I am very impressed with this watch face. It is very good looking, awesome ambient mode, day and date are there, and the battery meter is nice to have and doesn't take up much room at all. Can't beat the price either. Well done.
title: Perfect.

comment: It's a very beautiful, functional watch face.  Very well laid out.  To me, the only thing that would make it perfect was if there was the ability for the user to set how long the second hand sweeps/ticks before going into sleep mode.  Thanks for making this face public!!

author: Pierre Dumas
comment: I tried many faces but this one finally delivers.  It's easy to read in both modes.  I would suggest maybe to drop the useless beats per second function and give us the function to choose the delay for ambient mode
title: Finally !!

author: Dylan Yarbrough
comment: Would give 5 stars if a square option were available, and had a little more customization options. But, it does what its supposed to do. Can't complain much.

author: Leonard Lim
comment: Almost got myself to develop a flat tire compatible watch face till I stumble on this. A marvellously created watch face that is zero nonsense. Loving it with Fossil Q Marshal

author: Bhaskarjyoti Hazarika
comment: One of the simplest yet loveliest faces. The best thing is you can adjust the bit rate if the second hand. Would love to see a step counter. Till then 4 stars.

author: Adam Tuck
comment: Love the look of this watch face, the accent colours make it easy to subtly switch up the look. I would really like to be able to disable the second hand though.
title: Looks great!

author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: Simple, effective (unlike this phones keyboard)  I like this,bits going to become a staple in my watch box
title: Nice, staple face for ease of use

author: amit dhamal
comment: Loved it 5* . Pls add option for showing digital time and more options to customise the hour,minute,second hands. In ambient mode option to hide the clock hands and show digital time.
title: Beautiful face

author: Josh Friend
comment: I downloaded every face I could find that looked even halfway decent. This one is by far the best. It's just awesome!
title: The only good one

author: Tom Brookman
comment: Would be great to have the hour and minute hands of the standard mode in high contrast mode, too.  Wrote the developer but didn't even get an answer. :-(

author: Alan Stoddart
comment: ..... With a few more options will be 5 star.Looks amazing on my Sony.High contrast mode is stunning,looking forward to update.Keep up the good work!
title: Great.....

author: Rob K
comment: Such a nice watchface, with an awesome design. Great that it has a mode for AMOLED screens. Simply beautiful. I hope it gets more functions...
title: Less is more

author: Salman Halim
comment: This face made me write its review. Excellent job by dev! Best aviator face available on play store.
title: One of the best

author: John L.
comment: Nicest analogue face I have used so far.  I look forward to the new upcoming settings that have been mentioned.
title: Very Good

author: Brian Romines
comment: I in stalled it and it showed right up and was very easy to use it looks nice and smooth
title: I like the look

author: Alfredo Rodriguez
comment: Easy to read, effective, clean, clear, and best ambient mode, cause is not that "diluted" in ambient, and retain 90% of it looks.
title: Simple, but yet, one of the best...

author: Jerry Wang
comment: Beautiful simple and functional. Would like the addition of choosing how long the seconds hand stays on the screen. Maybe in a future enhancement?

author: Tony Wang
comment: Works very well with ambient display turned on.
title: Great on battery life and understated but elegant

author: Ulrich Romahn
comment: Considering this watch face is from a hobby programmer, I am deeply impressed! It's "beauty" is it's simplicity.

author: Michael Bains
comment: Amazing on the 360 Sport. Job well done!
title: Wow!

author: Darren Bilverstone
comment: This face is simple and easy to read, just as any aviator face should be. Very happy.
title: Clean and Simple

author: The Tech Librarian
comment: Simple light no bloat. Maybe add more colors but that's a wants as is works good

author: Ron Shirley II
comment: Very good simple design. I'd like to see a white faced version, too.
title: Classic

author: Martin Spasovski
comment: Just found out about this watch face, love it!
Best I have seen in a while, only watch face I need
title: Love the look

comment: I never write reviews. Never. Excellent canvas top face. Keep up the good work.

author: Colin Priest
comment: Really clean and crisp display, selectable colour insert, just the ticket!
title: Excellent

author: Alen Zilic
comment: Love the high contrast, perfect for amoled displays like my zenwatch 3

author: Yud Ye
comment: Beautifully designed watch face, with lots of details, many thanks!
title: My favorite watch face!

author: Eric Hunt
comment: Simple but elegant and one of the best watch faces I've downloaded

author: Dave Brown
comment: Would be nice to have more options.

reply.author: Gaëtan
reply.content: Many thanks Dave for your positive feedback. I will be adding new features on the watch face in the future. In case you may have any suggestion don't hesitate to let me know. There is a contact email on the Google Play app page.

title: Great watch face!

author: Michal Palczewski
comment: Perfect, has all you need nothing you don't. Love it

author: John Hewer
comment: Tried many. Like this one.

author: Tony B
comment: Readable and classic looking. A new favourite
title: Very nice

author: Ael singing gaming video
comment: Simple and yet beautiful, love it very much
title: Keren abez

author: Øyvind Buljo
comment: Awesome! Would be even better with a square watch option.

author: KAMAROZMAN AHMAD
comment: Haute Horlogerie
title: COO

author: John Barsness
comment: Quick and easy, looks great. Asus Zenwatch 2
